snippet: Kevin Stadler, the son of Craig Stadler, won the Phoenix Open for his first PGA Tour title when Bubba Watson missed a 5-foot par putt.
abstract: Golf Roundup; Kevin Stadler wins Phoenix Open for his first PGA title; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Stadler, the son of Craig Stadler, won the Phoenix Open for his first PGA Tour title when Bubba Watson missed a 5-foot par putt.

headline.main: Stadler Joins Father as PGA Tour Winner
headline.print_headline: Stadler Joins Father as PGA Tour Winner
